涊字的基本解释

涊
niǎn
出汗的样子：“涊然汗出，霍然病已”。

涊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǎn］
［《廣韻》乃殄切，上銑，泥。］
(1)汗出貌。
(2)见“涊淟”。

涊字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涊； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页626第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?乃殄切，音撚。【博雅】淟涊，垢濁也。【陸機·文賦】謬?黃之秩序，故淟涊而不鮮。　又【玉篇】淟涊，惡醉貌。　又汗出貌。【枚乗·七發】涊然汗出。　又【唐韻】而軫切【集韻】爾軫切，?音忍。水名，在上黨。

涊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
涊字的起名意思

暂无。

muddy water
Basic explanation of words
muddy water
niǎn
Sweating appearance: "Sweat out, Huo Ran is sick."
muddy water
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǎn］
["Guangyun" is cut, milled, and muddy. ]
(1) Sweat appearance.
(2) See "涊淟".
muddy water
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Collection] [Shui Character Department] 　涊; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 626 Page 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? It is cut, the sound is twisted. [Bo Ya] 淟涊, dirty and muddy. 【Lu Ji·Wenfu】Absurd? Huang's order is so lingering and not fresh.　[Jade articles] 淟涊, wicked drunk appearance.　 Sweat and look again. [Meicheng·Seven Hair] Sweat out.　[Tang Yun] and Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Er Zhen cut,? Yin Ren. The name of water is in Shangdang.
muddy water

Nothing.
niǎn
только в сочетаниях; см. 涊然, 涊淟, 淟涊
